name: Frog Wizard Gem Quest
description:
Discover the powers of magic gems and use them to solve puzzles!

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Space then press any direction to cast spell

Z to undo a move

R to reset the entire puzzle

H to show a hint for the current puzzle

Esc to exit the puzzle to try a different one



Credits:

A game made by Alan Hazelden and Patrick Traynor

Made for Thinky games are for everyone jam (jam page for this game)

Most sound effects from: http://osabisi.sakura.ne.jp/m2/

Font: Kalam

Thanks to Anuj071, Le Slo, Chatran, PleasingFungus, and Ian MacLarty for playtesting.
